July 13, 2023 - Iconics are unique pieces of equipment in Cyberpunk 2077 that can usually only be obtained once from a single source. They also have unique characteristics or stats compared to their standard counterparts. Main article: Cyberpunk 2077 Weapons Main article: Cyberpunk 2077 Clothing

Cyberpunk 2077 throws you headfirst into a neon-drenched, gritty future where corporations rule and street smarts are your best armor. This open-world RPG boasts stunning visuals, a captivating story, and a deeply customizable character. What shines: The atmosphere is unparalleled.
